message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.MM 

The paper proposes a deep learning method to improve prediction of tissue outcome in ischemic stroke patients using MRI data. This involves fusing information from standard kinetic models of diffusion and perfusion MRI with automated data selection of raw 4D PWI image information, followed by a data-driven deep-learning modeling of the underlying blood flow hemodynamics. This work involves computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE) techniques, as well as medical imaging (cs.MM) applications.
